layouts.desc: Switching to a static site generator while also fixing some stuff! I'm getting close to making this perfect! I still need to upload some artwork, though...
Finally made a layout for the home page that I'm happy with! I also made some subtle changes for the headers throughout the site for a bit more consistency!
A minor upgrade! This one was mostly to clean up the previous layout's really messy CSS.
The very first layout! Inspired by [Rina Cat's Domain](http://web.archive.org/web/20041206135411/rinacat.com/main.html).
